duties_responsibilities.duty: Support content teams in identifying and prioritizing key Netflix IP suitable for game adaptation.
Coordinate and facilitate communication between linear content teams and game producers (external or internal).
Support a creative process that leads to the creation of new IP suitable for series or film adaptation.
Coordinate with cross functional creative leads and the Head of Transmedia on the strategy, structure, and plans to build a transmedia ecosystem.
Act as a central hub that tracks, reports, and updates game rights management.
Identify and evaluate soon-to-be or newly released games as candidates for adaptation and possible transmedia connectivity.
Collaborate with teammates by providing and receiving creative/team feedback, improving others’ creative contributions, and providing clear creative goals.
Form relationships with content executives and creative talent to determine suitable film/series concepts for game adaptation.
Evaluate and determine which film/series concepts are well suited for games or vice versa.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Content Development, Entertainment, Game Design or a related field (Master's preferred)
